languages.text: "Извиняй, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Слишком долго болтал{mf||а} — я заскучал". {n}Каллигос невозмутимо пожимает плечами и подмигивает.{/n} "И все же по душе мне было вместе с тобой по этим лесам бегать да ксеносов кромсать. Славная охота выдалась, нечего сказать. А за славную охоту полагается соразмерная награда! Вортен?"

"Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"
languages.original_text: "Извиняй, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Слишком долго болтал{mf||а} — я заскучал". {n}Каллигос невозмутимо пожимает плечами и подмигивает.{/n} "И все же по душе мне было вместе с тобой по этим лесам бегать да ксеносов кромсать. Славная охота выдалась, нечего сказать. А за славную охоту полагается соразмерная награда! Вортен?"

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I got bored." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "I've had so much fun, running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt begets a proper reward! Worten?"

"Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I got bored." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "I've had so much fun, running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt begets a proper reward! Worten?"

A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

"Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

languages.text: «Lo siento, {mf|novato|novata}. Llevamos demasiado tiempo hablando y me he aburrido». {n}Calligos se encoge de hombros y te guiña un ojo como si nada.{/n} «Sin embargo, me he divertido mucho correteando por el bosque y haciendo pedazos a los xenos con usted. Ha sido una buena cacería. ¡Y una buena cacería merece una buena recompensa! ¿Worten?».
languages.original_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, {mf|novato|novata}. Llevamos demasiado tiempo hablando y me he aburrido». {n}Calligos se encoge de hombros y te guiña un ojo como si nada.{/n} «Me he divertido mucho correteando por el bosque y haciendo pedazos a los xenos con usted. Ha sido una buena cacería. ¡Y toda buena cacería merece una recompensa adecuada! ¿Worten?».

languages.text: “不好意思，新来的。咱们聊得太久了，我已经开始觉得烦了。”{n}卡里戈斯耸了耸肩，朝你平静地眨了眨眼。{/n}“和你一起在森林里跑来跑去，把异形撕成碎片，我相当享受这一切。我承认，这是一场绝妙的狩猎，出色的狩猎值得嘉奖！沃尔腾？”
languages.original_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

traits.locale_text: “不好意思，新来的。咱们聊得太久了，我已经开始觉得烦了。”{n}卡里戈斯耸了耸肩，朝你平静地眨了眨眼。{/n}“和你一起在森林里跑来跑去，把异形撕成碎片，我觉得相当有趣。我承认，这是一场绝妙的狩猎，出色的狩猎值得嘉奖！沃尔腾？”

languages.text: « Désolé, novice. Ces bavardages ont trop duré, je m'ennuyais. » {n}Calligos hausse les épaules et vous lance un clin d'œil nonchalant.{/n} « J'ai tout de même passé un excellent moment à parcourir la forêt en massacrant les xénos avec vous. C'était une bonne chasse, qui mérite une récompense appropriée ! Worten ? »
languages.original_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

traits.locale_text: « Désolé, novice. Ces bavardages ont trop duré, je m'ennuyais. » {n}Calligos hausse les épaules et vous lance un clin d'œil nonchalant.{/n} « J'ai tout de même passé un excellent moment à parcourir la forêt en massacrant les xénos avec vous. C'était une bonne chasse, et ça mérite une récompense appropriée ! Worten ? »

languages.text: 「悪いな、新米よ。話が長すぎて…退屈になっていた」{n}カリゴスは肩をすくめ、ウィンクをする。{/n}「しかし、森を駆け回り、お前と一緒に異種族を引き裂いたのは、とても楽しかった。いい狩りだった。いい狩りには、それなりの報酬が必要だ！ウォーテン？」
languages.original_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

traits.locale_text: 「悪いな、新米よ。話が長すぎて…退屈になっていた」{n}カリゴスは肩をすくめ、ウィンクをする。{/n}「しかし、森を駆け回り、お前と一緒に異種族を引き裂いたのは、とても楽しかった。いい狩りだった。いい狩りには、それなりの報酬が必要だ！ウォーテン？」

languages.text: "Tut mir leid, neues Blut. Wir reden schon zu lange, mir wird langweilig." {n}Calligos zuckt mit den Schultern und zwinkert dir unbeeindruckt zu.{/n} "Und doch war es ein großer Spaß, mit Euch durch den Wald zu rennen und die Xenos zu zerfetzen. Wirklich eine gute Jagd. Und eine gute Jagd verdient eine gute Belohnung! Worten?"
languages.original_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"

traits.locale_text: "Tut mir leid, neues Blut. Wir reden schon zu lange, mir ist langweilig geworden." {n}Calligos zuckt mit den Schultern und zwinkert dir unbeeindruckt zu.{/n} "Es war ein solcher Spaß, mit Euch durch den Wald zu rennen und die Xenos zu zerfetzen. Wirklich eine gute Jagd. Und eine gute Jagd verdient eine gute Belohnung! Worten?"

languages.text: "Üzgünüm taze kan. Konuşmamız çok uzadı. Ben de sıkılmaya başladım." {n}Calligos, omuzlarını silkerek sana istifini bozmadan göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Yine de seninle birlikte ormanda koşturup durarak zenoları lime lime etmek hoşuma gitti. Gerçekten de iyi bir avdı. İyi bir ava da düzgün bir ödül yakışır! Worten?"
languages.original_text: "Sorry, new blood. We've been talking for too long — I grew bored of it." {n}Calligos shrugs his shoulders and winks at you, unfazed.{/n} "And yet I've enjoyed running around the forest and tearing the xenos to shreds with you. A good hunt indeed. And a good hunt calls for a proper reward! Worten?"
